description.value: This Extension resource is constrained to support condition associated links

requirements.value: The ability to add extensions in a structured way is what keeps FHIR resources simple.

definition.value: A reference to another resource (e.g. MedicationOrder, Observation, ReferralRequest etc.) associated/linked to this condition.
A reference to another resource (e.g. MedicationOrder, Observation, ReferralRequest etc.) associated/linked to this condition.
